details.brokersummary:
335 Fenimore: Luxurious Living Near Prospect Park Stunning 3-Bedroom Apartment with Private Terrace! No Broker Fee!
Apartment Features: Air Conditioning Hardwood Floors Stainless Steel Appliances Dishwasher Spacious Common Area Pet-Friendly Abundant Natural Light Track Lighting
Building Amenities: Gym Parking Laundry Room Roof Deck Media Room Bike Room
Prime Location: Just 2 blocks from the 2, 5, and Q trains Only 2 blocks from Prospect Park
Enjoy a perfect blend of luxury and convenience in this beautiful unit!

1 bedroom plus home office!
Located in East Williamsburg ? just around the corner from the Montrose L and Lorimer J/M trains. The apartment features: Hardwood floors, Spacious kitchen with stainless steel appliances, Large living room, 1 queen size and 1 smaller size bedroom.
Heat & Hot Water is included.
Surrounded by the best local bars, restaurants, cafes, and a short commute to Manhattan! Pink Metal Bar, The Tradesmen, Baby Blues Luncheonette, Swallow Cafe, House of Yes, Roberta?s Pizza, etc around the corner!
Available June 1 Small pets OK No broker fee

Fabulous 2 bedroom in a classic elevator prewar Williamsburg building. EXCLUSIVE! Fully renovated with gorgeous hardwood floors and tons of natural light streaming in. You?ll love living in this vibrant, lively neighborhood with all the necessities right outside your door and steps away from hotspots like Baby?s All Right, Bembe and Rabbit Hole. Commuting is quick and easy with a short walk to the Marcy JMZ. This beauty won?t last long, so call now!

Myspace Exclusive! Beautiful apartment in Williamsburg, prime location!
This 2 bedroom apartment features a spacious living room, queen-sized bedrooms, stainless steel kitchen, modern bathroom, hardwood floors, and windows that let in natural light throughout.
You?ll be right around the corner from dozens of top-rated bars, restaurants, cafes, grocers, and music/art venues. Local favorites include Westlight, Brooklyn Bowl, Extra Fancy, Lucky Dog, Baby?s All Right, Patrizia?s, Battery Harris, Post Office, and Freehold.
Short commute to Manhattan & easy access to the rest of Brooklyn?s hottest neighborhoods. Only # blocks from the L train, and a # minute walk to the JMZ trains
June 1 move in Small pets welcome No broker fee

2 bed 1 bath in gorgeous area of Crown Heights
- Elevator building - Newly renovated - Huge bedroom - Big living area with window - On-site super - Stainless steel appliances
Available 4/1/2024 Small pets OK Broker fee applies

Myspace Exclusive!
One bedroom with separate living room and kitchen in 1920s elevator prewar with live-in super.
- Queen sized bedroom - Big living room space - Tons of light, exposed brick, updated modern bathroom, kingsize bedrooms & plenty of space for entertaining.
Fabulous location just steps from Montrose L / Flushing JMZ trains and surrounded by tons of great bars, restaurants & shopping. Short commute to Manhattan!
June 1 move in No broker fee Heat & hot water included Small pets welcome

Myspace Exclusive!
1 bedroom layout with extra office! Stainless steel appliances, eat in kitchen. Nice layout!
The building is an extremely well-maintained 1920s prewar featuring stainless appliances, hardwood floors, tons of sunlight, high ceilings and lots of space. Pet friendly, heat & hot water included!
Call today, as this listing will not last.
June 1st move in Small pets OK No broker fee

Big 1 bedroom by the park!
- hardwood floors - heat and hot water included
Available now SMALL pets OK Broker fee applies

Welcome to your new home at 804 Jefferson Ave!
You?ll absolutely love your new, fabulous 1-bedroom home, graced with an array of modern fixtures and finishes as well as a thoughtful split-wing layout. Your 1-bedroom, 1-bathroom home is a stunning Bed-Stuy rental nestled close to restaurants, grocery stores, bars, and parks. Features of the home include hardwood floors, recessed lighting, casement windows, and in-wall heating and cooling units.
The home opens into a cozy living room and kitchenette. The kitchenette is equipped with a sleek white countertop, a mosaic tile backsplash, lacquer cabinetry, and a suite of stainless steel electric appliances from Blomberg, Frigidaire, LG, and Haier, including a dishwasher and a microwave. Your full bathroom has been upgraded with modern features including a beautiful, mosaic tile wall!
804 Jefferson is located just a quick jaunt away from all of the restaurants, bars, grocery stores, and shops that line Ralph and Patchen Avenues and Malcolm X Boulevard. You will be just a few minutes from Broadway and very close to Reinaldo Salgado Playground and Saratoga Park. The building has an elevator, bicycle storage, a fully-equipped laundry room, a common rooftop deck with gorgeous neighborhood views, and on-site parking at an additional fee. The J and Z subway lines are only a few blocks away.
Schedule your private showing with us today!
July 1 move in Broker fee applies Pets OK for $50/mo

Welcome to your new home at 804 Jefferson Ave!
You?ll absolutely love your new fabulous 2-bedroom home, graced with an array of modern fixtures and finishes as well as a thoughtful split-wing layout. Your 2-bedroom, 1-bathroom home is a stunning Bed-Stuy rental nestled close to restaurants, grocery stores, bars, and parks. Features of the home include hardwood floors, recessed lighting, casement windows, and in-wall heating and cooling units.
The home opens into a cozy living room and kitchenette. The kitchenette is equipped with a sleek white countertop, a mosaic tile backsplash, lacquer cabinetry, and a suite of stainless steel electric appliances from Blomberg, Frigidaire, LG, and Haier, including a dishwasher and a microwave. Your full bathroom has been upgraded with modern features including a beautiful, mosaic tile wall!
804 Jefferson is located just a quick jaunt away from all of the restaurants, bars, grocery stores, and shops that line Ralph and Patchen Avenues and Malcolm X Boulevard. You will be just a few minutes from Broadway and very close to Reinaldo Salgado Playground and Saratoga Park. The building has an elevator, bicycle storage, a fully-equipped laundry room, a common rooftop deck with gorgeous neighborhood views, and on-site parking at an additional fee. The J and Z subway lines are only a few blocks away.
Schedule your private showing with us today!

No need to choose between Bushwick and BedStuy with this one! Live right on that line and enjoy one of the quickest growing and most popular neighborhoods today. With all the conveniences of and Broadway right outside and Myrtle Avenue just down the street, you'll have everything you need nearby. Quickly walk to a HUGE grocer (such a luxury in Brooklyn), bars and restaurants galore, and the easiest transportation ever! Conveniently located off the J and M trains as well as the B15, B38, B46, B47, and B54 bus routes. FEATURES: Hardwood Floors Stainless Steel Kitchen Excellent Natural Light! Shared Laundry Room Shared Roof Deck Bike Storage Parking (by availability) Pet Friendly for only $50/month!!

Beautifully renovated 2br in an elevator building. Has an amazing roof deck with skyline views. Laundry in the building as well. Primo location right off the Morgan stop of the L train. - Elevator- Laundry Room- Roof top with AMAZING view of Manhattan- Dishwasher, Microwave, Stainless Steel Appliances- Hardwood floors- Garage under the building - Zip Cars available- Separate enclosed AC/Heating units for each room. Quiet and efficient?Just first and security deposit to move in, NO FEE!Pets OK!note: if you can't see the video please send me a message and I'll send it over.

2 Bed / 1bath with private balcony, in a brand new elevator building!
Unit features: Private balcony Bedrooms on opposite sides of the large living room Faces the back of the building away from any street noise Sunny 4th floor apartment Hardwood floors Dishwasher Stainless steel appliances Custom kitchen and bath Separate efficient PTAC heat and cooling units in all rooms. Large windows throughout bringing light into the entire apartment Owner will purchase additional armoire / standing closets
Building features: Affordable parking spots available ButterflyMX intercom Multiple laundry rooms Huge Roof deck Zipcars available Bike storage State-of-the-art security system throughout
Fantastic location close to tons of local spots as well as a 2min walk to the Myrtle/Broadway JMZ and 12min to the L train.
Pets ok No fee Just 1st and security to move in
Call or text to view the right away!

ONE-OF-A-KIND 1 bed / 1 bath TRIPLEX with large private roof terrace! TWENTY NINE FOOT HIGH ceilings with original brick detail throughout and the church?s original 120-year-old hand-painted tin ceiling!! Vaulted ceilings in this historic church building give it a large open feel. Must see in person to get the full size.
If you can?t see the video please let me know and I?ll text it to you
Unit features: Hardwood floors Dishwasher Microwave Stainless steel appliances Custom kitchen and bath Large private terrace Separate efficient PTAC heat and cooling units in both rooms. Large windows throughout bringing light into the entire apartment Spacious bedrooms and living room Owner will purchase additional armoire / standing closet if needed
Building features: Garage parking ButterflyMX intercom Multiple laundry rooms Huge Roof deck Zipcars available Bike storage Go Lockers for shipping and receiving packages securely State-of-the-art security system throughout Fantastic location close to tons of local spots as well as a 2min walk to the Myrtle/Broadway JMZ and 12min to the L train. There is an elevator to the roof shared roof deck but not to the apartment because there is no elevator in this part of the building. Up 2 flights. 4 laundry rooms , one on each floor.
Pets ok No fee . Guarantors welcome. $20 app fee Call or text to view the right away. This is priced to GO!

Sunny 2 bed / 1 bath attached a now renovated 140yo church which has been converted into luxury apartments and sunday school
Unit features: Hardwood floors Dishwasher Stainless steel appliances Custom kitchen and bath with beautiful tile work and granite countertops. Floor to ceiling windows Separate efficient PTAC heat and cooling units in all rooms Queen Sized bedrooms Owner will purchase additional armoire / standing closet if needed
Building features: ButterflyMX intercom Latch bluetooth lock system Multiple laundry rooms Garage Parking ($250-300/mo) Huge Roof deck Zipcars available Bike storage Go Lockers for shipping and receiving packages securely State-of-the-art security system throughout
Fantastic location close to tons of cool local spots as well as a 2min walk to the Myrtle/Broadway JMZ and 12min to the L train. Pets ok No fee $20 app fee Call or text to view the right away.

Gorgeous Bushwick 4 bedroom is newly renovated and the perfect share! The 4 full bedrooms all have windows and there are 2 fully tiled bathrooms. The open chef?s kitchen gives you plenty of space to create and the brand new stainless steel appliances make cooking and cleanup quick and easy. There?s a breakfast bar that extends into the spacious open living area, with space for dining and relaxing. There?s a washer/dryer in unit and you?ll always stay comfy with heat/ac units in each room. Huge PRIVATE backyard is prefect for warm weather cook outs and growing your owns veggies or herb garden. Building and apartment are on the ?Latch? access, so no keys needed! Amazing location just 2 blocks from the Jefferson L!! There are unlimited choices for brunch, shopping or a night out just steps from your door.
Pets are welcome! NO FEE In unit W/D Private Yard Contact today to view!

Beautiful 2 bed with 1 bath unit with great sunlight and hardwood floors.
- Stainless steel appliances - Hardwood floors - Balcony - Washer/dryer in the unit - Central AC - Dishwasher - High ceilings - Elevator building
Located near the Bedford L and the Metropolitan G/L subway lines. Incredible bars/restos and cafes nearby!
Broker fee applies (1 month Pets OK Available 6/1

Newly renovated 3 bedroom!
No fee
1.5 bath Hardwood floors Stainless steel appliances
Incredible location - Morgan L, Jefferson L, Central M trains. Gold Sounds, Little Whiskey, Associated Grovery, House of Yes, etc nearby.
June 1 move in Pets OK with approval

Virtual tours available! Beautiful 3 BR / 3 bath apartment in Williamsburg, prime location! This apartment features a spacious living room, queen-sized bedrooms, stainless steel kitchen, modern bathrooms, hardwood floors, and windows that let in natural light throughout. You'll be right around the corner from dozens of top-rated bars, restaurants, cafes, grocers, and music/art venues. Local favorites include Westlight, Brooklyn Bowl, Extra Fancy, Lucky Dog, Baby's All Right, Patrizia's, Battery Harris, Post Office, and Freehold. Short commute to Manhattan & easy access to the rest of Brooklyn's hottest neighborhoods. Only blocks from the L train, and a short walk to the JMZ trains

Virtual tours available!
Beautiful 3 bed / 1 bath apartment in Bushwick, prime location!
This apartment features a spacious living room, queen-sized bedrooms, stainless steel kitchen, modern bathroom, hardwood floors, and windows that let in natural light throughout. You'll be right around the corner from dozens of top-rated bars, restaurants, cafes, grocers, and music/art venues. Local favorites include Mominette, Sea Wolf, Three Diamond Door, Precious Metal, The Rookery, Heavy Woods, Idlewild, Clara's, Yours Sincerely, Chuko, Los Hermanos, Wheelhouse.
Short commute to Manhattan & easy access to the rest of Brooklyn's hottest neighborhoods. Only blocks from the L train, and a short distance to the J, M trains.

Reside in a gorgeous 2 bed / 1 bath apartment with stainless steel appliances, hardwood floors, natural sunlight, modern features, and easy access to trains. To live in Crown Heights is to live in convenience and a diverse community. Enjoy the luxury of having access to most train lines like the 2,3,4,5 and C, or switch to any letter train at Atlantic terminal. Enjoy a short walk to Brooklyn Museum, Prospect Park, and Botanic Garden. Crown Heights offers a number of local restaurants and bars like Chavela's, Dutch Boy, Cent'Anni, Drink Lounge, 99 Rogers, Mayfield, Cafe Rue Dix, Glady's and more! Easy commute to Manhattan & easy access to the rest of Brooklyn's hottest neighborhoods.

Virtual tours available!
Beautiful apartment in East Williamsburg, prime location!
This apartment features spacious living room, queen sized bedrooms, stainless steel kitchen, modern bathroom, hardwood floors, and windows that let in natural light throughout.
You'll be right around the corner from dozens of top-rated bars, restaurants, cafes, grocers, and music/art venues. Local favorites include Roberta's, Sweet Science, Honey's, Wayward Social, Syndicated, Guadalupe, Reclamation, Ichiran, Momo Sushi Shack, El Cortez.
Short commute to Manhattan & easy access to the rest of Brooklyn's hottest neighborhoods.

77 Commercial is a new landmark on the north edge of the Greenpoint, Brooklyn waterfront, situated between two great outdoor spaces ? a beautiful, lushly landscaped inner court to the east, and the long anticipated Box Street Park to the west.
Discover a range of living spaces tailored to your needs, including studios, 1-bedroom, 2-bedroom, and 3-bedroom layouts.
Apartment Features: -Expansive living areas boasting breathtaking views -Fully equipped kitchens with stainless steel appliances -Dishwasher -In-unit washer/dryer for added convenience -Individual AC/Heat units -Big windows inviting abundant natural light -Soaring high ceilings and elegant hardwood floors
Building Amenities: -State-of-the-art fitness center -Relaxing sauna -Basketball and tennis courts -Inviting indoor pool with direct access to outdoor pool deck -Multiple BBQ grilling areas -Rooftop retreat offering panoramic views -Residents lounge and versatile working space -Entertainment-filled recreation room -Secure bicycle storage -Convenient elevators -Parking garage available (additional fee applies)
Location: Enjoy seamless access to the new esplanade and ferry terminal, ensuring swift commutes to Manhattan.
